titleStmt.title: Sorrovves lenitiue Written vpon occasion of the death of that hopefull and noble young gentleman, Iohn Lord Harrington, Barron of Exton, &c. Who died the 27. of Febr. 1613. By Abraham Iackson.
titleStmt.author: Jackson, Abraham, 1589-1646?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Roger Iackson, and are to be solde at his shop neere the great Conduit in Fleet-street,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: his shop neere the great Conduit in Fleet-street
